page.title: 14CLUBS, LYNEMOUTH
page.content: {Inns and Social Clubs cont'd. The leisure time activities of many of the people includes gardening. Some people devote much of their time to the growing of flowers and plants whilst others spend time and money on producing vegetables. {Shows. In the village and also in towns and villages nearby flower and vegetable shows are very popular. Great rivalry and competition exists amongst individuals as to who is the best gardener. Prizes are generally given in vouchers which can be redeemed at local shops.Total prize money is often more than Â£1000. This enables every exhibitor to be given even a small cash prize for their entry.
